name: Corn On The Cob With Cumin Butter
keywords: butter, corn on the cob, cumin, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, side dish, summer

recipeInstructions.text: Shuck corn. Bring enough water to boil in large covered pot to cover corn. Add salt, if desired. When water boils, add corn and cook, covered, about 5 minutes. Drain and serve with cumin butter.
To make cumin butter, melt butter and stir in cumin; let stand about 5 minutes. To serve, roll corn in cumin butter, or use pastry brush to paint corn with butter.
